Player History
Drafted in 46th round, 542nd overall pick, by Milwaukee in 2019...
Had first career hit on 4/14/2019, off Arron Ormond (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/23/2019, off Marcos Ortiz (OAK)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/11/2020 to a 2-year deal worth $3,300,000 per year...
Injured on 7/24/2020 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Was claimed off waivers by Milwaukee on 3/7/2021.
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2021, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
